New Records: First nation to concede more than 200 in four consecutive T20 internationals
Key Match Events: Tim David hit a four on the final ball to deliver Australia a thrilling win over New Zealand
Tim David scored 31 off 10 balls, hitting 29 runs of the 32 required in nine balls
Rachin Ravindra scored 68 off 35 balls with six sixes
Adam Zampa and Glenn Maxwell were banished from the attack after expensive overs
Post-Match Reflections: Mitch Marsh expressed pride in Tim David's performance
Doubts linger over whether Steve Smith will go to his fourth T20 World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia did the job without Steve Smith
This series is Australia's last hit-out before the June tournament
